snippet.title: Hard West Gameplay - Ep 1 - Introduction (Let's Play)
snippet.description:
Hard West Gameplay Preview! My hard west gameplay is starting tomorrow so I thought I would give you guys a preview of Lets Play Hard West coming to the channel!  If you liked XCOM, you'll probably love Hard West. Stay tuned to the channel for my gameplay!

Six shooters and the supernatural collide in Hard West - a tactical RPG that has you facing down cannibals, cultists, and demons on your path of vengeance.

If you're a fan of XCOM, Shadowrun Returns, or just wish there were more good westerns, you'll want to pay attention to this one. Just a few of the things that make Hard West cool:
- Bullets hurt. You won't find walking bullet sponges here. You'll need to play smart to stay alive.
- Ricochet bullets, use shadows to spot enemies around corners, and flip the furniture for makeshift cover.
- Collect and combine cards into poker hands to create special abilities for your gunslingers.

Download Hard West on Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/307670/

Check out some of my other playlists!

►Watch my Kingdom Series: http://bit.ly/KingdomGamelplay

►Ark Survival Evolved - http://bit.ly/ArkSurvivalGame

► Let's Play Rebel Galaxy - http://bit.ly/RebelGalaxyGameplay

► Let's Play Dex Cyberpunk RPG - http://bit.ly/DexCyberpunkRPG

Follow Me On Social Meida!
Subscribe: http://bit.ly/ScDlJ1
Donate: https://streamtip.com/t/zueljin
Patreon:http://www.patreon.com/zueljin
Twitter: http://twitter.com/zueljin
Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/id/zueljin/home/
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/zueljin
Askfm: ask.fm/Zueljin
Instagram: instagram.com/zueljin
Google+: https://plus.google.com/+zueljin/posts

Hard West Information:
Developer: CreativeForge Games Publisher: Gambitious Digital Entertainment Genre: Turn-based Tactical Western Platforms: PC, Mac, Linux Release: November 18th 2015 Standard Edition Price: $19.99 / £14.99 / €19.99 / pуб.419 / R$36.99 / A$22.99 Digital Collector’s Edition Price: $24,99 / £18.99 / €24.99 / pуб.449 / R$45.99 / A$28.99 Digital Collector’s Edition Includes: Digital Artbook, Original Digital Comic Book, and Full Original Digital Soundtrack which was mastered and composed by Marcin Przybylowicz (The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt)Website: www.gambitious.com  

Intro Animation by Mikes Arts:
https://www.youtube.com/user/FulltoneGFX

Intro Music by:
Render - Prism: https://youtu.be/WAg8iCoH07w
